thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 07 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Credit Agricole and Bankia in talks over consumer finance JV in Spain​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Credit Agricole and Bankia in talks over consumer finance JV in Spain​
text:
March 7 (Reuters) - Credit Agricole:
* ‍CRÉDIT AGRICOLE CONSUMER FINANCE AND BANKIA ARE IN EXCLUSIVE NEGOTIATIONS TO SET UP A PARTNERSHIP IN CONSUMER FINANCE IN SPAIN​
* CREDIT AGRICOLE AND BANKIA SAY EXCLUSIVE NEGOTIATIONS AIM TO ESTABLISH A JOINT-VENTURE IN CONSUMER FINANCE BUSINESS IN SPAIN
* CRÉDIT AGRICOLE SAYS PARTNERSHIP AIMS AT ACCELERATING THE SETTING UP OF ITS PRESENCE IN SPAIN, THE FOURTH LARGEST CONSUMER FINANCE MARKET IN THE EUROZONE
* IT SAYS PARTNERSHIP WOULD PROVIDE BANKIA WITH A SUBSIDIARY DEDICATED TO CONSUMER FINANCE AND ADD A GROWTH MARKET TO ITS PORTFOLIO OF BUSINESS ACTIVITIES IN SPAIN​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reporting by Paris Newsroom)
